mapper.select: SELECT DDLIKE, DPCODE, DPDDCODE, DPLINK FROM (SELECT DD_LIKE AS DDLIKE, DP_CODE AS DPCODE, DP_DDCODE AS DPDDCODE, DP_LINK AS DPLINK, DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY DD_LIKE DESC) AS RANKING FROM DP INNER JOIN DD ON DP_DDCODE = DD_CODE AND DP_DDSUCODE = DD_SUCODE AND DP_DDDATE = DD_DATE ) WHERE RANKING <= 9
SELECT DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY AGE DESC) AS RNK, AGE, SUCODE, BBCODE, BBHEIGHT, BBWEIGHT, HEAD FROM HEALTHSTATUS WHERE SUCODE = #{suCode} AND BBCODE = #{bbCode} ORDER BY AGE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FC(FC_CODE, FC_FBCODE, FC_FBSUCODE, FC_FBDATE, FC_SUCODE, FC_DATE, FC_CONTENT) VALUES (#{fcCode}, #{fcFbCode}, #{fcFbSuCode}, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{fcFbDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{fcSuCode}, DEFAULT, #{fcContent})
mapper.update: UPDATE FC SET FC_DATE = DEFAULT, FC_CONTENT = #{fcContent} WHERE FC_CODE = #{fcCode} AND FC_FBCODE = #{fcFbCode} AND FC_FBSUCODE = #{fcFbSuCode} AND FC_SUCODE = #{fcSuCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE FC WHERE FC_CODE = #{fcCode} AND FC_FBCODE = #{fcFbCode} AND FC_FBSUCODE = #{fcFbSuCode} AND FC_SUCODE = #{fcSuCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DC(DC_CODE, DC_DATE, DC_DDCODE, DC_DDSUCODE, DC_DDDATE, DC_SUCODE, DC_CONTENT) VALUES (#{dcCode}, DEFAULT, #{dcDdCode}, #{dcDdSuCode}, TO_DATE(#{dcDdDate}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{dcSuCode}, #{dcContent})
mapper.update: UPDATE DC SET DC_DATE = DEFAULT, DC_CONTENT = #{dcContent} WHERE DC_CODE = #{dcCode} AND DC_DDCODE = #{dcDdCode} AND DC_DDSUCODE = #{dcDdSuCode} AND DC_SUCODE = #{dcSuCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE DC WHERE DC_CODE = #{dcCode} AND DC_DDCODE = #{dcDdCode} AND DC_DDSUCODE = #{dcDdSuCode} AND DC_SUCODE = #{dcSuCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MC (MC_CODE, MC_DATE, MC_COCODE, MC_SUCODE, MC_CONTENT) VALUES (#{mcCode}, DEFAULT, #{coCode}, #{mcSuCode}, #{mcContent})
mapper.update: UPDATE MC SET MC_DATE = DEFAULT, MC_CONTENT = #{mcContent} WHERE MC_CODE = #{mcCode} AND MC_DATE = TO_DATE(#{mcDate}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND MC_COCODE = #{coCode} AND MC_SUCODE = #{mcSuCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE MC WHERE MC_CODE = #{mcCode} AND MC_DATE = TO_DATE(#{mcDate}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND MC_COCODE = #{coCode} AND MC_SUCODE = #{mcSuCode}
mapper.select: SELECT RT_DOCOCODE AS RESCOCODE, RT_DOCODE AS RESDOCODE, TO_CHAR(RT_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS RESDATE, RT_TIME AS RESTIME, RT_COUNT AS RESCOUNT FROM RT WHERE RT_DOCOCODE = #{resCoCode} AND RT_DOCODE = #{resDoCode} AND RT_DATE = TO_DATE(#{resDate}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')

SELECT NVL(TO_CHAR(MAX(RE_CODE)+1), TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{resDate}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYYMMDD') || '01') AS RECODE FROM RE WHERE RE_DOCOCODE = #{resCoCode} AND RE_DOCODE = #{resDoCode} AND TO_CHAR(RE_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{resDate}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYYMMDD')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RE VALUES (#{resCode}, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{resDate}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYYMMDD') || #{resTime} || '00', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{resAccess}, #{resCoCode}, #{resDoCode}, DEFAULT, #{resSuCode}, #{resBbCode}, NULL)
mapper.update: UPDATE RT SET RT_COUNT = #{resCount} WHERE RT_DOCOCODE = #{resCoCode} AND RT_DOCODE = #{resDoCode} AND RT_DATE = TO_DATE(#{resDate}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND RT_TIME = #{resTime}
